name: Holy Knight
description: The Holy Knight embodies valor and protection, showcasing exceptional melee capabilities and durability with a greatsword and a radiant-infused attack.
memorable: Provides immunity to fear for allies and can heal significantly, making it a powerful support character in battle.
goals: To protect allies and maintain morale while dealing significant damage to foes.
relations: Can be accompanied by other knights or paladins and may serve a noble cause.
environment: Commonly found in locations associated with justice, nobility, or valor, such as castles or holy sites.
strengths: High strength and constitution contribute to impressive attack damage and resilience in combat.
weaknesses: Moderate dexterity affects ranged combat effectiveness, and below-average intelligence limits strategic options.
attacks: Utilizes a greatsword for melee attacks, dealing slashing and radiant damage, and can perform devastating lance charges mounted.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Courage grants allies within 10 feet immunity to fear.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 15, allowing for good awareness of surroundings.
skills: Proficient in athletics, insight, perception, and religion, reflecting both physical prowess and moral authority.
additional_information: Can restore 30 hit points with Lay On Hands once per day.
Has an action to inspire allies, providing a bonus to their attack rolls and saving throws.
Multiattack ability increases potential damage output in combat.
Combat capabilities are enhanced when mounted, allowing for greater reach and damage.
Condition immunity to frightened enhances battlefield presence.
test_queries: battle knight that grants fear immunity
radiant damage dealing knight with support skills
knight that inspires allies during combat
